snippet.title: The Water Knight
snippet.description: The Water Knight Action game. Jump from platform to plat form and try to reach the treasure of each level.

snippet.title: Star Forge
snippet.description: Star Forge Build defense around the Star Forge space base to keep enemy units away from the base to prevale.

snippet.title: Angry King
snippet.description: Angry King Action game. Collect all items and stay alive timing your jumps right from platform to platform.

snippet.title: Sparkman: Stop World
snippet.description: Sparkman: Stop World Platform game. Try to collect all the dots in order to activate the exitpoint of each level.

snippet.title: Strike Force Heroes
snippet.description: Strike Force Heroes Platform shooter. The secret lab is under attack of bad guys. Go out and destroy your enemies.

snippet.title: Ninja Game
snippet.description: Ninja Game Action game. Bounce, jump, fight, throw or run and become the best of all ninja's ever lived.

snippet.title: Truck Loader 4
snippet.description: Truck Loader 4 Puzzle game. Make sure the cargo will get into the truck using your forklift to make it happen.

snippet.title: Formula Driver 3D
snippet.description: Formula Driver 3D Racing game. Prove your F1 skills on the different tracks and earn cash to upgrade your car.

snippet.title: Randobot
snippet.description: Randobot Platform game. Find enough energy cells to repair the broken robot that you need to command.

snippet.title: War Zombie: Avatar
snippet.description: War Zombie: Avatar Platform shooter. Get your guns ready and destroy all enemy units in the area and complete the game.
